description:
Do you know the legend of the Kraken? Enter this game of decisions where you will have to hunt this famous mythological animal. Your actions will be key. Will you be able to defeat the feared Kraken that terrorizes the seas?

Enjoy this game with more than 100 choices and endless possibilities. You will be able to unlock up to 28 alternative endings.

Think well your choice and advance in this intriguing game where intuition is decisive.
name: Pirates: The Legend of the Kraken
intro: Can you defeat the fearsome Kraken? A fascinating game of choices where you are the key. Recruit your crew, track the Kraken and defeat it. The fate of the sea depends on you.
